summary: Grove v0.9.92 introduces the new Wanderer Feedback System and Sentinel stress testing for a more resilient platform, alongside beautiful organic vine visuals on the landing page. We've made significant improvements to text legibility in dark mode, refined our router (now named Passage), and completed our migration to Svelte 5 for a smoother, more modern foundation. This release focuses on enhancing user experience with clearer interfaces, stronger reliability, and more ways for you to share your thoughts with us.

features: add Mermaid flowchart to Claude code review format
improve Claude code review prompt with structured guidance (#677)
add How It Works section for explainer articles (#673)
add public contribute page and update issue-first workflow
add "Read more" links to entries with help articles (#665)
name the router Passage with kayak icon (#644)
fixes: render vines on top of gradient background
soft gradient edge for vine panel backgrounds
add transparency to vine panels for reveal effect
add TypeScript types for feedback system env vars
improve admin text legibility in dark mode (#659)
prevent stale dashboard counts after post changes (#623) (#679)
use word-aware text splitting for preview text (#652)
allow clearing nav links in mobile menu (#676)
